dublin_core.dcvalue: mSOS is an SMS-based disease notification system where health care workers immediately relay information on suspected priority diseases to sub-county, county and national MOH officials. Response actions, epidemic graphs and maps are displayed on the mSOS web portal.
Matilu Mwau, Principal Research Officer, KEMRI, Email: mitsuru.toda@gmail.com
Data collection and reporting, Infectious Diseases, Parasitic Diseases, malaria and other vector-borne dieseases
